rooms.description: A welcoming area with ample natural light and a foyer that leads to the main living spaces.
An open space designed in Mediterranean style with exposed stone walls and terracotta tiles, featuring a semi-open kitchen area.
A comfortable and airy bedroom with Vastu-aligned east or north facing window for positive energy flow.
Fully equipped bathroom with modern fixtures and adequate natural light while adhering to Vastu principles regarding water placements.
A quiet retreat featuring built-in shelves for books and reading nook by a window with a calm view of the terrace above.
A spacious outdoor area designed for relaxation and social gatherings. It includes Mediterranean-style pergolas, seating areas, and an integrated water feature to promote positive energy.
